Uses of Class
com.erudika.para.security.UserAuthentication

Packages that use UserAuthentication
Package Description
com.erudika.para.security
The security module - handles authentication.
com.erudika.para.security.filters
Authentication filters - these handle social login and external authentication.

    Represents a user authentication with JWT.
